sentences.text: DEAR RAYTHEON SHAREHOLDER,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of Raytheons Board of Directors and management team, I cordially invite you to attend the Raytheon Company 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on Thursday, May 25, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we continued to effectively execute our long-term global growth strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Net sales of $24.1 billion were up 3.5 percent compared to 2015, and marked the companys best sales growth rate since 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 bookings were up more than 10 percent year-over-year and reached a new company record of $27.8 billion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This growth positions us well for the future, along with our $36.9 billion total backlog at the end of 2016  a 6 percent increase from the end of 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, our total shareholder return outperformed the S&P 500 for the sixth consecutive year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By executing world-class operational performance in the delivery of our technologically advanced products and services, we believe we have not only created long-term value for our shareholders, but contributed to making the world a safer place.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A key to our success is the active role the Board plays in overseeing the formulation, planning and implementation of the strategy that drives our performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to an annual review of Raytheons long-term strategy and five-year financial plan, the Board regularly considers the progress of and challenges to Raytheons strategy and related risks throughout the year in light of developments in the business environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Boards focus over the past five years on its composition and refreshment have resulted in a Board composed of directors with an array of skills, attributes and experience well suited to support the companys strategy and operations over the long term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An essential complement to Raytheons operational and financial performance is our commitment to sound governance and corporate stewardship.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Boards oversight, the company has continued its formal outreach twice each year to engage with shareholders on governance and executive compensation matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In our latest effort to promote transparency and accountability, this newly revamped proxy statement for 2017 reflects a redesign initiative to make information more accessible and understandable for investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With our shareholders and other stakeholders in mind, we also continue to approach corporate responsibility strategically by pursuing efforts that can really make a difference and have a lasting impact.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to review this proxy statement, and to vote your proxy as soon as possible so that your shares will be represented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is designed to attract and retain highly-qualified executives, motivate our executives to achieve our overall business objectives, reward individual performance, and align our executives interests with those of our shareholders.

sentences.text: Our executives must be of a caliber and level of experience necessary to manage our complex, global businesses effectively.

sentences.text: Several features of our compensation program reflect our compensation objectives:

sentences.text: The Board continues to believe that an advisory vote on executive compensation every year would be in the best interests of Raytheon and its shareholders for a number of reasons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: First, we have learned during Raytheons extensive annual investor outreach efforts that our shareholders continue to support and appreciate the annual advisory vote.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It will also help guide communications with shareholders in Raytheons ongoing efforts to identify and address concerns  whether on executive compensation or otherwise.

sentences.text: An advisory vote that is less frequent could mean delay in identifying and addressing shareholder concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe an annual vote would be most consistent with the Boards approach to corporate governance.

sentences.text: Raytheon has in recent years taken a number of steps that promote access and accountability.

sentences.text: IRC Section 162(m).

sentences.text: In general, Section 162(m) places a limit on the deductibility for federal income tax purposes of the compensation paid to a companys Chief Executive Officer or any of its three other most highly compensated executive officers (other than its Chief Financial Officer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Section 162(m), compensation paid to such individuals in excess of $1 million in a taxable year generally is not tax deductible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, compensation that qualifies as performance-based under Section 162(m) does not count against the $1 million limitation and is tax deductible.

sentences.text: One of the requirements of performance-based compensation is that the company must disclose the material terms of the plan under which compensation may be paid, and those terms must be approved by the companys shareholders.

sentences.text: 9. General Provisions.

sentences.text: 9.1 No Individual Rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No individual or Participant shall have any claim to be granted any Award under the Plan, and the Company has no obligation for uniformity of treatment of Participants under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.2 No Guarantee of Employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participation in this Plan shall not be construed to confer upon any Participant the legal right to be retained in the employ of the Company or give any person any right to any payment whatsoever, except to the extent of the benefits provided for hereunder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Participant shall remain subject to discharge to the same extent as if this Plan had never been adopted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing in this Plan shall prevent, interfere with or limit in any way the right of the Company to terminate a Participants employment at any time, whether or not such termination would result in
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the ailure of payment of any Award, and/or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) any other adverse effect on the Participants interests under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.3 No Limit on Other Compensation Arrangements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing contained in the Plan shall prevent the Company or its Affiliates from adopting or continuing in effect other compensation arrangements (whether such arrangements may be generally applicable or applicable only in specific cases) as the Committee in its discretion determines desirable, including, without limitation, the granting of incentive compensation or equity-based awards otherwise than under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.4 Non-Transferability of Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No award under the Plan shall be transferable other than by will, the laws of descent and distribution or pursuant to beneficiary designation procedures approved by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except to the extent permitted by the foregoing sentence, no award may be sold, transferred, assigned, pledged, hypothecated, encumbered or otherwise disposed of (whether by operation of law or otherwise) or be subject to execution, attachment or similar process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon any attempt to sell, transfer, assign, pledge, hypothecate, encumber or otherwise dispose of any such award, such award and all rights thereunder shall immediately become null and void.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.5 Governing Law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The provisions of this Plan shall be governed by, construed and administered in accordance with applicable federal law; provided, however, that to the extent not in conflict with federal law, this Plan shall be governed by, construed and administered under the laws of the State of Delaware, other than its laws respecting choice of law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.6 Tax Withholding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall have the right to withhold from the payment of any Award under the Plan any federal, state or local taxes in accordance with applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.7 Compliance With Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the Companys intention that any and all compensation payable under the Plan shall not be subject to taxation under Section 409A because it either is exempt from Section 409A or complies with Section 409A, and all terms and provisions herein shall b interpreted to satisfy such intention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.8 Compliance With Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the Companys intention that any and all compensation payable under the Plan shall qualify as performance-based compensation for purposes of Section 162(m) of the Code, and all terms and provisions herein shall be interpreted to satisfy such intention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.9 No Trust or Fund.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan is intended to constitute an unfunded plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing contained herein shall require the Company to segregate any monies or other property, or shares of common stock of the Company, or to create any trusts, or to make any special deposits for any immediate or deferred amounts payable to any Participant.

sentences.text: 9.10 Successors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All obligations of the Company under the Plan with respect to Awards shall be binding on any successor to the Company, whether the existence of such successor is the result of a direct or indirect purchase, merger, consolidation, or otherwise, of all or substantially all the business and/or assets of the Company.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any provision of the Plan or any Award is determined to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable in any jurisdiction, or as to any person, or would disqualify the Plan or any Award under any law deemed applicable by the Committee, such provision shall be construed or deemed amended to conform to applicable laws, or, if it cannot be so construed or deemed amended without, in the Committees determination, materially altering the intent of the Plan or the Award, such provision shall be stricken as to such jurisdiction, person or Award, and the remainder of the Plan and any such Award shall remain in full force and effect.
